name: Plants Vs. Rappers Mod Friday Night Funkin
name_original: Plants Vs. Rappers Mod Friday Night Funkin
description:
Controls: click to select in menu, Arrow keys/ASWD to hit a note.

Update 0.1: Released the game

Update 0.2: Made Sick, Good, And Bad Sprites will be different colors, colors from a traffic light,

Menu Sprites will now be green/blue  When Mouse is Over it

added a feature that makes pressing  space + a + down arrow + c + enter crash your game
